function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Exposure to COVID-19 in multiple countries during the mentioned time periods.","Impact":"Increased risk of contracting COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Adhering to strict hygiene practices, practicing social distancing, and following local health guidelines.","Technologies":"Contact tracing apps, temperature screening technology, and air filtration systems.","People":"Travelers, local residents, and healthcare workers.","Owner":"Government health agencies, local authorities, and individuals."}]}
